title: [Large-Scale] Online Intensive Short-Term Case-Based Teaching and Learning (CBTL) for Developing Clinical Reasoning Skills in Dentistry

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental science theories and clinical practicum experience (beginner level)
context.additional_context: Case-based learning activities conducted via online LMS for current practitioners, with a formative assessment environment providing immediate feedback

learning_goals: Learners can analyze patient symptoms and test results in given clinical cases to derive appropriate diagnoses.
Learners can establish case-based treatment plans and explain their logical connection to diagnostic outcomes.
Learners can systematically describe decision-making processes in dental clinical reasoning through CBTL (Case-Based Teaching and Learning) activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
